entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
